data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: A distributed operating system manages a group of distinct computers and makes them appear to be a single computer. The ____ of ____ computers ____ could ____ linked ____ communicate ____ each ____ gave ____ to ____ computing. Distributed ____ are ____ out ____ more ____ one ____. When computers in a group work in cooperation, they form a distributed system.
data.partBlankContent: A distributed operating system manages a group of distinct computers and makes them appear to be a single computer. The devel______ of netw_____ computers th__ could b_ linked a__ communicate wi__ each ot___ gave ri__ to distr______ computing. Distributed comput______ are car____ out o_ more th__ one mac____. When computers in a group work in cooperation, they form a distributed system.
data.answer: 分布式操作系统管理着一组不同的计算机，使它们看起来像是一台计算机。可以相互连接和通信的网络计算机的发展导致了分布式计算的出现。分布式计算在多台机器上进行。当一组计算机协同工作时，它们就形成了一个分布式系统。
